#cloud-config

apt_update: true
apt_upgrade: true
packages:
 - python-pip
 - python3-pip
 - python-dev
 - build-essential
byobu_default: system 

users:
 - name: ubuntu 
   ssh_authorized_keys:
    - ssh-rsa  ubuntu@group-15-ansible
    - ssh-rsa  nygards@Nygards
   sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

runcmd:
 - sudo mkdir /home/ubuntu/.ssh
 - chmod 700 /home/ubuntu/.ssh
 - touch /home/ubuntu/.ssh/authorized_keys
 - chmod 600 /home/ubuntu/.ssh/authorized_keys
 - echo "ssh-rsa  ubuntu@group-15-ansible" >> /home/ubuntu/.ssh/authorized_keys
 - echo "ssh-rsa  nygards@Nygards" >> /home/ubuntu/.ssh/authorized_keys
